1.1_focus_area_alignment.evidence: Core AI-powered B2B SaaS tool in emerging AI sales automation category; Recipe 1.3 shows 250% YoY growth in 'AI sales agent' searches; Recipe 2.1 signals indicate $12B+ TAM

1.2_stage_alignment.evidence: Seed-stage venture (pre-revenue, post-validation) matches typical organizational sweet spot; clear path from MVP to Series A

1.3_risk_return_profile.evidence: Moderate technical risk (Recipe 7.1 proven stack), large market (Recipe 2.1), defensible moat (Recipe 4.1, 9/10 counter-positioning); acceptable risk/return

1.4_timing_alignment.evidence: RIGHT TIME per Recipe 3.1 signals - AI sales automation accelerating 250% YoY, remote work catalyst, GPT-4 API availability; organizational readiness unknown

1.5_portfolio_strategy_fit.evidence: Fills strategic gap in AI sales automation; no cannibalization risk identified; strong fit for B2B SaaS portfolio

2.1_technical_capabilities_ip.evidence: Recipe 7.1: proven stack (GPT-4, React, AWS), 6-month build, low risk; Recipe 7.3: zero IP blockers; no proprietary tech identified

2.2_network_partnerships.evidence: Recipe 1.2: 6 design partners (Ahmed H, Azim Hamza, Samer Diab); Recipe 7.2: CRM integrations (HubSpot, Salesforce) strategic for distribution

2.3_domain_expertise.evidence: Deep B2B SaaS sales/demo expertise demonstrated across 8 comprehensive validation artifacts; Recipe 5.1 shows sophisticated competitive intelligence

2.4_proprietary_assets.evidence: Recipe 4.1: conversational demo data moat (7/10 Cornered Resources) - first-mover advantage; no existing proprietary data/platform identified

2.5_brand_reputation.evidence: No established brand documented; Recipe 4.1 notes brand is 3/10 moat (not priority); performance reputation strategy recommended

3.1_leadership_bandwidth.evidence: No dedicated VP/Director-level leader identified with ≥70% time allocation; unclear team structure; CRITICAL GAP for execution

3.2_team_composition.evidence: No core team documented; Recipe 7.1 requires 2-3 engineers; Recipe 7.2 requires GTM lead; estimated 5-8 critical hires needed

3.3_capital_requirements.evidence: No explicit capital allocation documented; estimated $800K-$1.2M needed for 12-18 month runway (compliance $235K, product $150K, GTM $200K, team $300-500K)

3.4_timeline_execution.evidence: Recipe 7.1: 6-month build realistic; Recipe 7.2: GTM channels require 6-12 month ramp; Recipe 7.3: 6-12 months compliance; overall 12-18 month timeline

3.5_operational_dependencies.evidence: Recipe 7.3: manageable vendor dependencies (OpenAI/Anthropic, Recall.ai); Recipe 7.2: CRM partnerships 6-12 months; no critical single points of failure

strategic_alignment_score.name: Weighted Strategic Alignment Score
strategic_alignment_score.threshold: ≥7.0 for GO, 6.0-6.9 for CONSIDER, <6.0 for NO-GO

decision.rationale: Strategic Alignment Score = 7.1 ≥ 7.0 (meets GO threshold), BUT Resource Feasibility = 5.4 < 6.0 (below threshold). Decision framework: Any dimension <6.0 triggers CONSIDER even with overall ≥7.0.
decision.primary_constraint: Leadership Gap - No dedicated VP/Director-level leader with ≥70% bandwidth (Sub-Component 3.1 = 4/10)

conditions_for_go.requirement: Identify and commit VP-level leader with ≥70% availability and 5+ years B2B SaaS experience
conditions_for_go.verification: Signed commitment letter specifying % bandwidth, start date, 12-month minimum
Investment committee approval OR seed term sheet signed

conditions_for_go.requirement: Hire or allocate 4 critical roles: 2 senior engineers, 1 PM, 1 GTM lead
conditions_for_go.verification: Offer letters signed + start dates confirmed OR internal transfer approvals

conditions_for_go.requirement: Approve $235K phased compliance investment (call recording $20-40K, GDPR $100-200K, SOC 2 $62-135K)
conditions_for_go.verification: Compliance investment memo approved with phased budget

reassessment.trigger: All conditions met or deadline reached
